src:
Wishnutama dan Angela Tanoe Tidak Bagi-bagi Tugas
05 Nov 2019, 22:50 by Afif Farhan


Wishnutama dan Angela Tanoe (dok Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif)

FOKUS BERITA
Duet Wishnutama-Angela TanoeJakarta - Pariwisata dan ekonomi kreatif Indonesia ada di duet Wishnutama dan Angela Tanoe. Apakah ada pembagian tugas di antara keduanya?Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif, Wishnutama dan wakilnya Angela menghadiri acara Ngopi Bareng Mas Tama dan Mbak Angela yang digelar Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif di M Bloc Space, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa (5/11/2019). Mereka pun memaparkan banyak hal, dari bagaimana pengembangan pariwisata, devisa, dan lainnya.BACA JUGA: Berapa Target Kunjungan Turis ke Indonesia, Wishnutama?


Foto: (dok Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif)

Wishnutama dan Anegla Tanoe disebut sebagai duet 'satu frekuensi'. Sebab keduanya pernah sama-sama dari industri broadcasting.Lalu untuk pekerjaan sebagai menteri dan wakil menteri kali ini, apakah ada pembagian tugas?"Kita tidak bagi-bagi tugas, kita satu kesatuan," jelas Wishnutama sambil tersenyum.BACA JUGA: Wishnutama Mau Bikin Event Wisata di Indonesia Jadi Lebih KerenWishnutama menjelaskan, dirinya dan Angela sama-sama belajar soal pariwisata dan ekonomi kreatif setelah dilantik Presiden Jokowi. Setiap ada masalah, diselesaikan secara bersama."Kesannya kalau bagi-bagi tugas, gimana gitu. Masa saya ke sini, kamu ke sini kan kesannya kayak nggak kompak," terang pria yang akrab disapa Tama ini."Saya dengan bu wamen (wakil menteri) adalah satu kesatuan. Apapun tugasnya, kita selesaikan bareng-bareng," tutupnya.Simak Video "Tak Hadiri Wisuda Putrinya karena Pelantikan, Wishnutama Minta Maaf"[Gambas:Video 20detik](aff/aff)
FOKUS BERITA

Duet Wishnutama-Angela Tanoe
text:
Wishnutama and Angela Tanoe Do Not Share Tasks
05 Nov 2019, 22:50 by Afif Farhan


Wishnutama and Angela Tanoe (dock of the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy)

NEWS FOCUS
Wishnutama-Angela Tanoe duet Jakarta - Tourism and the creative economy of Indonesia are in the duo Wishnutama and Angela Tanoe. Is there a division of tasks between the two? Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy, Wishnutama and his representative Angela attend the Coffee and Mas Tama and Mbak Angela event held by the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy at M Bloc Space, South Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019) . They also explained many things, from how the development of tourism, foreign exchange, and others. READ ALSO: What is the Target of Tourist Visit to Indonesia, Wishnutama?


Photo: (dock of the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy)

Wishnutama and Anegla Tanoe are referred to as 'one frequency' duets. Because both of them have been together from the broadcasting industry. Then for work as ministers and deputy ministers this time, is there a division of tasks? "We do not divide tasks, we are one unit," Wishnutama explained with a smile. READ ALSO: Wishnutama Want to Make Tourism Event in Indonesia Becomes More CoolWishnutama explained, he and Angela both learned about tourism and the creative economy after being inaugurated by President Jokowi. Every time there is a problem, it is solved together. "The impression is that if you divide the tasks, how about that. When I come here, you come here, it doesn't feel like a compact," explained the man who is familiarly called Tama. ) is a unity. Whatever the task, we finish together, "he concluded. Watch Video" Not Attending His Daughter's Graduation for Inauguration, Wishnutama Apologize "[Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (aff / aff)

Wishnutama-Angela Tanoe duet
